name: invu technology
tag_list: presentations, advertising, real-estate, vacation-rentals, ecards, flash, slideshow
overview:
invu technology is a software company providing products and services for consumers, web companies, and enterprises.

invu technology is the creator of Glitzr a new website and web platform for easily creating Flash based presentations combining images, music, animation and captions for fun or business.

Glitzr can be used for fun or business.

Fun! Use Glitzr to create animated online greeting cards or slideshows to send to your friends and family

Business! Use Glitzr for selling your car, promoting your vacation home rentals, personals listings or events, and enhancing your small business website. Glitzr works seamlessly in any website or blog and also with popular listing sites like Craigslist, VRBO, Yelp. You can also easily just embed a link to a Glitzr into an e-mail.

Glitzr services can also easily be integrated into existing websites with our collection of widgets and APIs.
